amendment.description: To clarify the treatment of out of scope matters in conference reports.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2981 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 2981 proposed by Senator Lott for Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S2491-2493, S2506-2507; text: CR S2491-2492) To clarify the treatment of out of scope matters in conference reports.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2981 proposed by Senator Lott for Senator Ensign.
